Title: The Leftovers
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka
Plot: Three years after the disappearance of two percent of the global population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 10 wins & 59 nominations.
